sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT T1.MNG_MT AS MAIN_MNG_MT ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AS MAIN_MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_FEE_SJ AS MAIN_MNG_FEE_SJ ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.FCLTY_MNG_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_FCLTY_MNG_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ELCTY_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_ELCTY_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.WATER_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_WATER_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.GAS_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_GAS_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ENV_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_ENV_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MNG_TOTAL_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) || '-' || SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MAIN_MNG_YR_MT ,(CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MAIN_MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) AS MAIN_MNG_MT_YEAR ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MAIN_MNG_MT_MON ,T1.REG_USR AS MAIN_REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MAIN_REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR AS MAIN_UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MAIN_UPDT_DT ,(SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN NVL(MAX(NHT_ISUE_YN),'N') ELSE 'X' END) FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT=T1.MNG_MT AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ) AS MAIN_NHT_ISUE_YN FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F T1 WHERE 1=1
AND T1.MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || #sStartMngMt#
AND T1.MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || '01'
AND T1.MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#
AND T1.MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || '12'
AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#
ORDER BY T1.MNG_MT,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'999,999,999,990')) AS DATA_COUNT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(FCLTY_MNG_FEE),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_FCLTY_MNG_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(ELCTY_FEE),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_ELCTY_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(WATER_FEE),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_WATER_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(GAS_FEE),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_GAS_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(ENV_FEE),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_ENV_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(SUM(MNG_TOTAL_FEE),0),'999,999,999,990')) AS SUM_MNG_TOTAL_FEE FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F WHERE 1=1
AND MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || #sStartMngMt#
AND MNG_MT >= #sStartMngYear# || '01'
AND MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#
AND MNG_MT <= #sEndMngYear# || '12'
AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#

SELECT T1.MNG_MT AS MAIN_MNG_MT ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AS MAIN_MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_FEE_SJ AS MAIN_MNG_FEE_SJ ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.FCLTY_MNG_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_FCLTY_MNG_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ELCTY_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_ELCTY_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.WATER_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_WATER_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.GAS_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_GAS_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ENV_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_ENV_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MNG_TOTAL_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MAIN_MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) || '-' || SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MAIN_MNG_YR_MT ,(CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MAIN_MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) AS MAIN_MNG_MT_YEAR ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MAIN_MNG_MT_MON ,T1.REG_USR AS MAIN_REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MAIN_REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR AS MAIN_UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MAIN_UPDT_DT ,(SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN NVL(MAX(NHT_ISUE_YN),'N') ELSE 'X' END) FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT=T1.MNG_MT AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ) AS MAIN_NHT_ISUE_YN FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F T1 WHERE T1.MNG_MT = #mainMngMtYear# || #mainMngMtMon# AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mainMngFeeJobSe#

SELECT TO_CHAR(COUNT(*)) AS MT_CNT ,TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AS PREV_MT ,TO_CHAR(NVL(MIN((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F WHERE MNG_MT = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#)),0)) AS MAIN_CNT ,TO_CHAR(NVL(MIN((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F WHERE MNG_MT = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#)),0)) AS DETAIL_CNT ,TO_CHAR(NVL(MIN((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt#,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#)),0)) AS REQEST_CNT FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F WHERE MNG_MT = #sEndMngYear# || #sEndMngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #sMngFeeJobSe#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F SET MNG_FEE_SJ = #mainMngFeeSj# ,FCLTY_MNG_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mainFcltyMngFee#,',','')),0) ,ELCTY_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mainElctyFee#,',','')),0) ,WATER_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mainWaterFee#,',','')),0) ,GAS_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mainGasFee#,',','')),0) ,ENV_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mainEnvFee#,',','')),0) ,MNG_TOTAL_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mainMngTotalFee#,',','')),0) ,UPD_USR = #mainUpdUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MNG_MT = #mainMngMtYear# || #mainMngMtMon# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mainMngFeeJobSe#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mainMngMtYear# || #mainMngMtMon# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mainMngFeeJobSe#
DELETE FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mainMngMtYear# || #mainMngMtMon# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mainMngFeeJobSe#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.MNG_MT ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_SEQ ,T1.ENTRPSCD ,T2.ENTRPS_NM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.USAGE_AR,0),'999,990.0')) AS USAGE_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MNG_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ELCTY_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS ELCTY_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.WATER_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS WATER_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.GAS_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS GAS_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ENV_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS ENV_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.MNG_TOTAL_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) || '-' || SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_YR_MT ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) AS MNG_MT_YEAR ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_MT_MON ,T1.REG_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.REGIST_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REGIST_DT ,T1.UPD_USR AS UPD_USR ,TO_CHAR(T1.UPDT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDT_DT ,T3.REQEST_SEQ ,T3.PRT_AT_CODE ,T3.CHRGE_KND ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM024',T3.CHRGE_KND) AS CHRGE_KND_NM ,T3.ACCNUT_YEAR ,T3.NTIC_NO ,TO_CHAR(T3.FIRST_NTIC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FIRST_NTIC_DT ,TO_CHAR(T3.FIRST_PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FIRST_PAY_TMLMT ,TO_CHAR(T3.NTIC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTIC_DT ,TO_CHAR(T3.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_TMLMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T3.FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS FEE ,T3.VAT_YN ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM016',T3.VAT_YN) AS VAT_YN_NM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T3.VAT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T3.NTIC_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS NTIC_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T3.TOT_NTIC_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS TOT_NTIC_AMT ,T3.RCIV_SE ,(CASE WHEN T3.NHT_ISUE_YN='Y' THEN GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM025',T3.RCIV_SE) ELSE '미고지' END) AS RCIV_SE_NM ,TO_CHAR(T3.RCIV_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RCIV_DT ,(CASE WHEN T3.ROWID IS NOT NULL THEN NVL(T3.NHT_ISUE_YN,'N') ELSE 'X' END) AS NHT_ISUE_YN ,NVL(T3.NHT_PRINT_YN,'N') AS NHT_PRINT_YN ,T3.ADIT_NTIC_YN ,T3.ARRRG_NO ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T3.ARRRG_AMT,'999,999,999,990')) AS ARRRG_AMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T3.ARRRG_TARIFF,'0.000')) AS ARRRG_TARIFF ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(T3.ARRRG_PAY_DATES,'999,990')) AS ARRRG_PAY_DATES ,T3.RM ,T3.DEPT_CD
,(CASE WHEN T3.NHT_ISUE_YN='Y' AND T3.PAY_TMLMT < TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN '연체상태' END) AS ARRRG_STTUS
FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTRPS_INFO_F T2 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T2.ENTRPSCD) LEFT OUTER JOIN MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T3 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T3.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T3.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AND T1.MNG_SEQ=T3.MNG_SEQ AND 'N'=T3.ADIT_NTIC_YN) WHERE T1.MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# ORDER BY T1.MNG_SEQ
SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(MNG_SEQ),'000')) + 1,'000')) FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F WHERE MNG_MT=#mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=#mngFeeJobSe#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F ( MNG_MT ,MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,MNG_SEQ ,ENTRPSCD ,USAGE_AR ,MNG_FEE ,ELCTY_FEE ,WATER_FEE ,GAS_FEE ,ENV_FEE ,MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ,UPD_USR ,UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #mngMt# ,#mngFeeJobSe# ,(SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(MNG_SEQ),'000'))+1,'000')) FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe#) ,#entrpscd# ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#usageAr#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mngFee#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#elctyFee#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#waterFee#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#gasFee#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#envFee#,',','')),0) ,NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mngTotalFee#,',','')),0) ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE ,#updUsr# ,SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F SET ENTRPSCD = #entrpscd# ,USAGE_AR = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#usageAr#,',','')),0) ,MNG_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mngFee#,',','')),0) ,ELCTY_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#elctyFee#,',','')),0) ,WATER_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#waterFee#,',','')),0) ,GAS_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#gasFee#,',','')),0) ,ENV_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#envFee#,',','')),0) ,MNG_TOTAL_FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#mngTotalFee#,',','')),0) ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq#
sqlMap.select: SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(REQEST_SEQ),'000')) + 1,'000')) FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT=#mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=#mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ=#mngSeq#

SELECT SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) || '년 ' || SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) || '월' AS MNG_MT ,TO_CHAR(T1.NTIC_DT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS NTIC_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS PAY_TMLMT ,T3.ENTRPS_NM ,'0' AS RENT_FEE ,'-' AS RENT_VAT ,'0' AS RENT_AMT ,NULL AS RENT_RM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.VAT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.NTIC_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS MNG_AMT ,'세금계산서발행분' AS MNG_RM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ARRRG_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS ARRRG_FEE ,'-' AS ARRRG_VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.ARRRG_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS ARRRG_AMT ,'전월연체료' AS ARRRG_RM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.FEE,0) + NVL(T1.ARRRG_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS NTIC_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.VAT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS NTIC_VAT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T1.TOT_NTIC_AMT,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS NTIC_AMT ,NULL AS NTIC_RM ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.USAGE_AR,0),'999,990.0')) AS USAGE_AR ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.MNG_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS FCLTY_MNG_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.ELCTY_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS ELCTY_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.WATER_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS WATER_FEE ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.GAS_FEE,0),'999,999,999,990')) AS GAS_FEE ,'관리비(1)' AS MNG_FEE_RM ,'외환은행 광양지점' AS BANK_NM ,'631-000305-679' AS BANK_ACCOUNT_NO ,'여수광양항만공사' AS BANK_OWNER_NM FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T2.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AND T1.MNG_SEQ=T2.MNG_SEQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTRPS_INFO_F T3 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T3.ENTRPSCD) WHERE T1.MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND T1.MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND T1.REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#

SELECT T1.MNG_MT ,T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,T1.MNG_SEQ ,T1.REQEST_SEQ ,T1.ENTRPSCD ,T4.ENTRPS_NM ,T4.BIZRNO ,T4.RPRSNTV_NM ,T4.ADRES ,T4.ADRES2 ,T4.ZIP ,T3.MNG_FEE_SJ ,NVL((CASE WHEN T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN='N' THEN T2.USAGE_AR END),0) AS USAGE_AR ,NVL((CASE WHEN T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN='N' THEN T2.MNG_FEE END),0) AS MNG_FEE ,NVL((CASE WHEN T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN='N' THEN T2.ELCTY_FEE END),0) AS ELCTY_FEE ,NVL((CASE WHEN T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN='N' THEN T2.WATER_FEE END),0) AS WATER_FEE ,NVL((CASE WHEN T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN='N' THEN T2.GAS_FEE END),0) AS GAS_FEE ,NVL((CASE WHEN T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN='N' THEN T2.ENV_FEE END),0) AS ENV_FEE ,NVL((CASE WHEN T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN='N' THEN T2.MNG_TOTAL_FEE END),0) AS MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,(CASE WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='M' THEN '[M]:마린센터' WHEN T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE='E' THEN '[E]:전기시설' ELSE '[' || T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE || ']:' || 'UNKNOWN' END) AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE_NM ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,1,4) AS MNG_MT_YEAR ,SUBSTRB(T1.MNG_MT,5,2) AS MNG_MT_MON ,T1.PRT_AT_CODE ,T1.CHRGE_KND ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM024',T1.CHRGE_KND) AS CHRGE_KND_NM ,T1.ACCNUT_YEAR ,T1.NTIC_NO ,TO_CHAR(T1.FIRST_NTIC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FIRST_NTIC_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.FIRST_PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FIRST_PAY_TMLMT ,TO_CHAR(T1.NTIC_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NTIC_DT ,TO_CHAR(T1.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PAY_TMLMT ,NVL(T1.FEE,0) AS FEE ,T1.VAT_YN ,GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM016',T1.VAT_YN) AS VAT_YN_NM ,NVL(T1.VAT,0) AS VAT ,NVL(T1.NTIC_AMT,0) AS NTIC_AMT ,NVL(T1.TOT_NTIC_AMT,0) AS TOT_NTIC_AMT ,T1.NHT_ISUE_YN ,T1.NHT_PRINT_YN ,T1.ADIT_NTIC_YN ,T1.SETOFF_YN ,T1.NTIC_MTH ,T1.ARRRG_NO ,NVL(T1.ARRRG_AMT,0) AS ARRRG_AMT ,NVL(T1.ARRRG_TARIFF,0) AS ARRRG_TARIFF ,NVL(T1.ARRRG_PAY_DATES,0) AS ARRRG_PAY_DATES ,P2MGR.SF_MAKEDIGIT@YGPA_P2MGR(T1.PRT_AT_CODE || ASCII(SUBSTR(T5.FEE_TP,1,1)) || SUBSTR(T5.FEE_TP,2,1) || T1.ACCNUT_YEAR || T1.NTIC_NO || NVL(T1.ARRRG_NO,'0'),'BILLNO') AS CSTMR_REF_CODE ,DECODE(T1.PRT_AT_CODE,'620','1','621','2','3') || T5.FEE_TP_MAP || SUBSTR(T1.ACCNUT_YEAR,3,2) || T1.NTIC_NO || NVL(T1.ARRRG_NO,'00') AS ELEC_PAY_NO ,DECODE(T1.PRT_AT_CODE,'622','6374594','6374604') AS GIRO_NO ,P2MGR.SF_MAKEDIGIT@YGPA_P2MGR(T1.TOT_NTIC_AMT,'AMT') AS ELEC_NTIC_AMT ,'01' AS NTIC_CNT FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F T2 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T2.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE AND T1.MNG_SEQ=T2.MNG_SEQ) LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F T3 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T3.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T3.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE) LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTRPS_INFO_F T4 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T4.ENTRPSCD) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T5 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T5.PRT_AT_CODE AND GAM_GET_FEE_TP(T1.CHRGE_KND)=T5.FEE_TP) WHERE T1.MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND T1.MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND T1.REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F SET CHRGE_KND = #chrgeKnd# ,ACCNUT_YEAR = NULL ,NTIC_NO = NULL ,FIRST_NTIC_DT = NULL ,FIRST_PAY_TMLMT = NULL ,NTIC_DT = NULL ,PAY_TMLMT = NULL ,FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#fee#,',','')),0) ,VAT_YN = #vatYn# ,VAT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#vat#,',','')),0) ,NTIC_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#nticAmt#,',','')),0) ,TOT_NTIC_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#nticAmt#,',','')),0) ,RM = #rm# ,NHT_ISUE_YN = 'N' ,DEPT_CD = #deptCd# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#

UPDATE MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F SET CHRGE_KND = #chrgeKnd#
,ACCNUT_YEAR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') ,NTIC_NO = (SELECT LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(BILL_NO)),0) + 1,'000000')) FROM REV_COLL_F WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode# AND FEE_TP = GAM_GET_FEE_TP(#chrgeKnd#) AND FISCAL_YR = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')) ,FIRST_NTIC_DT = TO_DATE(#nticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,FIRST_PAY_TMLMT = TO_DATE(#payTmlmt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,NTIC_DT = TO_DATE(#nticDt#,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,PAY_TMLMT = TO_DATE(#payTmlmt#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
,ACCNUT_YEAR = NULL ,NTIC_NO = NULL ,FIRST_NTIC_DT = NULL ,FIRST_PAY_TMLMT = NULL ,NTIC_DT = NULL ,PAY_TMLMT = NULL
,FEE = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#fee#,',','')),0) ,VAT_YN = #vatYn# ,VAT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#vat#,',','')),0) ,NTIC_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#nticAmt#,',','')),0) ,TOT_NTIC_AMT = NVL(TO_NUMBER(REPLACE(#nticAmt#,',','')),0) ,RM = #rm#
,NHT_ISUE_YN = #nhtIsueYn# ,DEPT_CD = #deptCd# ,UPD_USR = #updUsr# ,UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#
UPDATE MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F SET NHT_PRINT_YN = #nhtPrintYn# WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#
DELETE FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mainMngMtYear# || #mainMngMtMon# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mainMngFeeJobSe#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T2.PRT_AT_CODE ,T2.FEE_TP ,T2.FISCAL_YR ,T2.BILL_NO ,T2.AGENT_CODE ,T2.BILL_AMNT ,TO_CHAR(T2.BILL_DT,'YYYYMM') AS BILL_YYYYMM ,TO_CHAR(T2.BILL_DT,'YYYYMMDD') AS BILL_DT ,T2.BILL_PRT_YN ,TO_CHAR(T2.DUE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS REV_DUE_DATE ,T2.BZ_RGST_ID ,T2.AGENT_NAME ,T2.DEPT ,T2.EMPL ,T2.WORK_CODE ,T2.USER_NAME ,T1.NTIC_AMT AS NTIC_AMT ,T1.TOT_NTIC_AMT AS BILL_SUM_AMNT ,NVL(T1.ARRRG_NO,'00') AS DLY_SER_NO ,TO_CHAR(T1.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYYMMDD') AS DLY_DUE_DATE ,(CASE WHEN T1.ARRRG_NO > '00' THEN TO_CHAR(T1.PAY_TMLMT,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE TO_CHAR(T2.DUE_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') END) AS DUE_DATE ,(CASE WHEN T1.ARRRG_NO > '00' THEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(T1.PAY_TMLMT,1),'YYYYMMDD') ELSE TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(T2.DUE_DATE,1),'YYYYMMDD') END) AS CLOSE_DATE ,(CASE WHEN T1.ARRRG_NO > '00' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END) AS BILL_TYPE ,T3.TRANID ,T4.RPRSNTV_NM AS KOR_NM ,T4.ADRES AS ADDR ,P2MGR.SF_MAKEDIGIT@YGPA_P2MGR(T1.PRT_AT_CODE || ASCII(SUBSTR(T2.FEE_TP,1,1)) || SUBSTR(T2.FEE_TP,2,1) || T1.ACCNUT_YEAR || T1.NTIC_NO || NVL(T1.ARRRG_NO,'0'),'BILLNO') AS CUSTOMER_NUM ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS PRINT_DT ,DECODE(T1.PRT_AT_CODE,'622','6374594','6374604') AS GIRO_NUM ,DECODE(T1.PRT_AT_CODE,'620','1','621','2','3') || T5.FEE_TP_MAP || SUBSTR(T1.ACCNUT_YEAR,3,2) || T1.NTIC_NO || NVL(T1.ARRRG_NO,'00') AS EGIRO_NUM FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN REV_COLL_F T2 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T2.PRT_AT_CODE AND T1.CHRGE_KND=T2.WORK_CODE AND T1.ACCNUT_YEAR=T2.FISCAL_YR AND T1.NTIC_NO=T2.BILL_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYEOSU.EGIRO@YGPA_PORTMIS T3 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T3.PRT_AT_CODE AND GAM_GET_FEE_TP(T1.CHRGE_KND)=T3.FEE_TP AND T1.ACCNUT_YEAR=T3.FISCAL_YR AND T1.NTIC_NO=T3.BILL_NO AND NVL(T1.ARRRG_NO,'00')=T3.DLY_SER_NO AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')=T3.WORK_DT AND T3.CANCEL_DT IS NULL) LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTRPS_INFO_F T4 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T4.ENTRPSCD) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.FEE_TP_F@YGPA_P2MGR T5 ON (T1.PRT_AT_CODE=T5.PRT_AT_CODE AND GAM_GET_FEE_TP(T1.CHRGE_KND)=T5.FEE_TP) WHERE T1.MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND T1.MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND T1.REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REV_COLL_F ( PRT_AT_CODE ,FEE_TP ,WORK_CODE ,FISCAL_YR ,BILL_NO ,AGENT_CODE ,BZ_RGST_ID ,AGENT_NAME ,BILL_DT ,DUE_DATE ,BILL_PRT_YN ,FIRST_BILL_DT ,BILL_AMNT ,VAT_YN ,VAT ,OVER_AMNT ,DC_AMNT ,AMNT_RSN ,DEPT ,EMPL ,USER_NAME ,RCVD_TP ,UPDT_UID ,UPDT_DATE ) SELECT T1.PRT_AT_CODE ,GAM_GET_FEE_TP(T1.CHRGE_KND) ,T1.CHRGE_KND ,T1.ACCNUT_YEAR ,T1.NTIC_NO ,T1.ENTRPSCD ,T2.BIZRNO ,T2.ENTRPS_NM ,T1.NTIC_DT ,T1.PAY_TMLMT ,NVL(T1.NHT_PRINT_YN,'N') ,T1.FIRST_NTIC_DT ,T1.FEE ,T1.VAT_YN ,T1.VAT ,0 ,0 ,#rm# ,#deptCd# ,#updUsr# ,#userName# ,'0' ,#updUsr# ,SYSDATE FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTRPS_INFO_F T2 ON (T1.ENTRPSCD=T2.ENTRPSCD) LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F T3 ON (T1.MNG_MT=T3.MNG_MT AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T3.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE) WHERE T1.MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND T1.MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND T1.REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REV_COLL_F SET BILL_PRT_YN = #nhtPrintYn# WHERE (PRT_AT_CODE, FEE_TP, FISCAL_YR, BILL_NO) = (SELECT PRT_AT_CODE, GAM_GET_FEE_TP(CHRGE_KND), ACCNUT_YEAR, NTIC_NO FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REV_COLL_F WHERE (PRT_AT_CODE, FEE_TP, FISCAL_YR, BILL_NO) = (SELECT PRT_AT_CODE, GAM_GET_FEE_TP(CHRGE_KND), ACCNUT_YEAR, NTIC_NO FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE UNPAID_F SET DLY_BILL_PRT_YN = #nhtPrintYn# WHERE (PRT_AT_CODE, FEE_TP, FISCAL_YR, BILL_NO, DLY_SER_NO) = (SELECT PRT_AT_CODE, GAM_GET_FEE_TP(CHRGE_KND), ACCNUT_YEAR, NTIC_NO, ARRRG_NO FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT = #mngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND MNG_SEQ = #mngSeq# AND REQEST_SEQ = #reqestSeq#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT TRANID, ,WORK_DT ,CANCEL_DT ,PRINT_DT FROM PAYEOSU.EGIRO@YGPA_PORTMIS WHERE TRANID = (SELECT MAX(TRANID) FROM PAYEOSU.EGIRO@YGPA_PORTMIS WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode# AND FEE_TP = #feeTp# AND FISCAL_YR = #fiscalYr# AND BILL_NO = #billNo# AND DLY_SER_NO = #dlySerNo# AND CANCEL_DT IS NULL)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYEOSU.EGIRO@YGPA_PORTMIS ( PRT_AT_CODE ,TRANID ,WORK_DT ,PRINT_DT ,CANCEL_DT ,EGIRO_TYPE ,DATA_TYPE ,SEQ_NUM ,CUSTOMER_NUM ,AMOUNT ,AMOUNT_AF ,DATA_FORMAT ,DUE_DATE ,CLOSE_DATE ,GIRO_NUM ,EGIRO_NUM ,AGENT_CODE ,BILL_TYPE ,ETC_TYPE ,KOR_NM ,BZ_RGST_ID ,BILL_YYYYMM ,ADDR ,RET_CODE ,RCVD_SEQ ,CHENAP_TIME ,CHENAP_MM ,ETC_COUNT ,ETC_TITLE ,ETC_TXT ,SEND_YN ,FEE_TP ,FISCAL_YR ,BILL_NO ,DLY_SER_NO ) VALUES ( #prtAtCode# ,TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSSSSFF') || RPAD(NVL(#prtAtCode#,' '),3) ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ,#printDt# ,#cancelDt# ,'GR6533' ,'22' ,'' ,#customerNum# ,#amount# ,#amouuntAf# ,'A' ,#dueDate# ,#closeDate# ,#giroNum# ,#egiroNum# ,#agentCode# ,#billType# ,'00' ,#korNm# ,#bzRgstId# ,#billYyyymm# ,#addr# ,' ' ,'0' ,'' ,'' ,'00' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,#feeTp# ,#fiscalYr# ,#billNo# ,#dlySerNo# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYEOSU.EGIRO@YGPA_PORTMIS SET CANCEL_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ,DUE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE+1,'YYYYMMDD') WHERE PRT_AT_CODE = #prtAtCode# AND FEE_TP = #feeTp# AND FISCAL_YR = #fiscalYr# AND BILL_NO = #billNo# AND DLY_SER_NO = #dlySerNo# AND TRANID = #tranid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F ( MNG_MT ,MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,MNG_FEE_SJ ,FCLTY_MNG_FEE ,ELCTY_FEE ,WATER_FEE ,GAS_FEE ,ENV_FEE ,MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ,UPD_USR ,UPDT_DT ) SELECT #mngMtYear# || #mngMtMon# ,MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,#mngMtYear# || '년 ' || #mngMtMon# || '월 관리비' ,FCLTY_MNG_FEE ,ELCTY_FEE ,WATER_FEE ,GAS_FEE ,ENV_FEE ,MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_F WHERE MNG_MT = #prevMngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe#

INSERT INTO FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F ( MNG_MT ,MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,MNG_SEQ ,ENTRPSCD ,USAGE_AR ,MNG_FEE ,ELCTY_FEE ,WATER_FEE ,GAS_FEE ,ENV_FEE ,MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ,UPD_USR ,UPDT_DT ) SELECT #mngMtYear# || #mngMtMon# ,MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,MNG_SEQ ,ENTRPSCD ,USAGE_AR ,MNG_FEE ,ELCTY_FEE ,WATER_FEE ,GAS_FEE ,ENV_FEE ,MNG_TOTAL_FEE ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F WHERE MNG_MT = #prevMngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe#

INSERT INTO MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F ( MNG_MT ,MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,MNG_SEQ ,REQEST_SEQ ,ENTRPSCD ,PRT_AT_CODE ,CHRGE_KND ,ACCNUT_YEAR ,NTIC_NO ,FIRST_NTIC_DT ,FIRST_PAY_TMLMT ,NTIC_DT ,PAY_TMLMT ,FEE ,VAT_YN ,VAT ,NTIC_AMT ,TOT_NTIC_AMT ,RM ,RCIV_SE ,RCIV_DT ,NHT_ISUE_YN ,DEPT_CD ,NTIC_MTH ,NHT_PRINT_YN ,ARRRG_NO ,ARRRG_AMT ,ARRRG_TARIFF ,ARRRG_PAY_DATES ,ADIT_NTIC_YN ,SETOFF_YN ,REG_USR ,REGIST_DT ,UPD_USR ,UPDT_DT ) SELECT #mngMtYear# || #mngMtMon# ,MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,MNG_SEQ ,REQEST_SEQ ,ENTRPSCD ,PRT_AT_CODE ,CHRGE_KND ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,FEE ,VAT_YN ,VAT ,NTIC_AMT ,TOT_NTIC_AMT ,#mngMtYear# || '년 ' || #mngMtMon# || '월 관리비' ,'0' ,NULL ,'N' ,#deptCd# ,'1' ,'N' ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,NULL ,'N' ,'N' ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE ,#regUsr# ,SYSDATE FROM MNG_FEE_LEV_REQEST_F WHERE MNG_MT = #prevMngMt# AND MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #mngFeeJobSe# AND ADIT_NTIC_YN = 'N'

select.isEqual:
SELECT /*+ INDEX (T2 PK_FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F) */ T1.MT
,NVL(SUM(T2.MNG_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,NVL(SUM(T2.ELCTY_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,NVL(SUM(T2.WATER_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,NVL(SUM(T2.GAS_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,NVL(SUM(T2.ENV_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,NVL(SUM(T2.MNG_TOTAL_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,COUNT(*) OVER () AS DATA_COUNT FROM ( SELECT #statEntrpscd# AS ENTRPSCD ,#statMngFeeJobSe# AS MNG_FEE_JOB_SE ,#statMngMtYear# || LTRIM(TO_CHAR(LEVEL,'00')) AS MNG_MT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(LEVEL,'00')) AS MT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12 ) T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F T2 ON ( T1.MNG_MT=T2.MNG_MT
T1.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE=T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE
T1.ENTRPSCD=T2.ENTRPSCD
) GROUP BY T1.MT ORDER BY T1.MT

SELECT /*+ INDEX (T2 PK_FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F) */ T1.ENTRPS_NM AS MT
,NVL(SUM(T2.MNG_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,NVL(SUM(T2.ELCTY_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,NVL(SUM(T2.WATER_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,NVL(SUM(T2.GAS_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,NVL(SUM(T2.ENV_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,NVL(SUM(T2.MNG_TOTAL_FEE),0) AS STAT_VALUE
,COUNT(*) OVER () AS DATA_COUNT FROM FCLTS_MNG_FEE_DETAIL_F T2 LEFT OUTER JOIN ENTRPS_INFO_F T1 ON (T2.ENTRPSCD=T1.ENTRPSCD)
WHERE T2.MNG_MT = #statMngMtYear# || #statMngMtMon#
WHERE T2.MNG_MT LIKE #statMngMtYear# || '%'
T2.MNG_FEE_JOB_SE = #statMngFeeJobSe#
T2.ENTRPSCD = #statEntrpscd#
GROUP BY T1.ENTRPS_NM ORDER BY T1.ENTRPS_NM

sqlMap.select: SELECT ENTRPS_NM FROM ENTRPS_INFO_F WHERE ENTRPSCD = #sEntrpscd#
